channel.title: ----Need Help With Combat xp rates!---
channel.description:
Hey,everyone.
I need help with combat xp rates.By this i mean..Once i attack a monster my str lvl or whatever i use goes to like 50.and if my xp rate is *Example* " Your Current Xp is 2000. You will Level at [u]2100[/u]" I want to change that "2100" to like 5000..so it just keeps raising x2 or what so ever everytime i gain a level.
(#1)--What I want is.. Everytime i attack something i want the " You will level at 2100" to rise even more so its harder to gain levels.
(#2)--What I want is..Whenever i attack an npc/monster i dont want my str lvl or whatever to go to 50 or 30..
Thankss.

item.title: ----Need Help With Combat xp rates!---

@Kartex wrote:

Hey,everyone.

I need help with combat xp rates.By this i mean…Once i attack a monster my str lvl or whatever i use goes to like 50.and if my xp rate is Example " Your Current Xp is 2000. You will Level at 2100" I want to change that “2100” to like 5000…so it just keeps raising x2 or what so ever everytime i gain a level.

(#1)–What I want is… Everytime i attack something i want the " You will level at 2100" to rise even more so its harder to gain levels.

(#2)–What I want is…Whenever i attack an npc/monster i dont want my str lvl or whatever to go to 50 or 30…
